completion.translation[0].definitions[0]: The house is nearing completion  (=almost finished).
The project has a completion date of December 22nd.
completion.translation[0].definitions[1]: The job is subject to your satisfactory completion of the training course.
On completion of the building, they make a final inspection.
completion.translation[0].definitions[2]: the final point in the sale of a house, when all the documents have been signed and all the money paid
completion.translation[1].definitions[0]: the final point in the sale of a property, when the documents have all been signed and all the money has been paid
When you buy a house in an auction, completion normally takes place four weeks later.
